trans-unit.source: Specifies how the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader"></xref> handle entities.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader"> </xref> håndtere enheter.

trans-unit.source: Expands character entities and returns general entities as <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Utvider tegn enheter, og returnerer generelle-enhetene som <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference>noder.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference>

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A> to see what the general entities expand to.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>for å vise de generelle-enhetene utvides til.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to optimize entity handling by only expanding the entity the first time it is used.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg til å optimalisere enheten behandler ved å vise enheten bare første gang den brukes.

trans-unit.source: When set to ExpandCharEntities, a reader call to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A> method expands all entities (both general and character entities).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger å ExpandCharEntities, leseren kall til den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A>metoden utvider alle enheter (både generell og tegnet enheter).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Expands all entities and returns the expanded nodes.
trans-unit.target: Utvider alle enheter, og returnerer de utvidede nodene.

trans-unit.source: The entity text is expanded in place of the entity references.
trans-unit.target: Enheten teksten utvides i stedet for entity-referanser.
